content: KHC Kwik-X CRC Dual Action Anchors Dual Action Anchor System includes KH-EZ CRC screw anchors with corrosion-resistant coating and KHC adhesive capsules. For fastening in concrete with performance of adhesive anchors and installation speed and simplicity of screw anchors ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Chemical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Unmatched combination of load capacity, productivity and simplicity – new dual-action technology combining the performance of adhesive anchors with the installation speed and simplicity of screw anchors Easier to install – SafeSet method and pre-configured adhesive capsules reduce the number of steps in the installation process and eliminate the need for accessories like brushes, air pumps and dispensers Up to 4x faster installation than injectable mortars – significantly reduce labor costs due to faster, easier setting with an impact driver, and possibility of immediate loading KH-EZ CRC coating meets ASTM B695 Class 55 for added corrosion resistance Extensive technical data including ESR for concrete, seismic category A-F – maximum application coverage and design flexibility fully supported by the PROFIS Engineering software suite Applications The Kwik-X CRC Dual Action anchor comprises the KHC adhesive capsule and the mechanically galvanized KH-EZ CRC screw anchor for high-performance anchoring of steel to concrete Fastening structural and non-structural steel baseplates to concrete where additional corrosion protection is needed Industrial fastenings – racking, machinery and other equipment ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material temperature at installation - range: -18 - 104 °F Tested/approved for diamond drilling: Yes, with DD 30-W SAFEset: Yes Technical Data | Base material temperature at installation - range | -18 - 104 °F | Tested/approved for diamond drilling | Yes, with DD 30-W | SAFEset | Yes | Installation tools | SIW 4AT-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench, SIW 6-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench | In-service temperature – range | -40 - 176 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 106 - 77 °F | PROFIS Software | Yes ### ITEMS- 3842873 - Kwik-X(KH-EZ CRC 1/2x5+KHC1/2“ LG) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x KH-EZ CRC 1/2x5 Screw - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x KH-EZ CRC 1/2x4 Screw - 25x KHC 1/2 Small Adhesive capsule - 3842872 - Kwik-X(KH-EZ CRC 1/2x5+KHC1/2“ SM) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x KH-EZ CRC 1/2x5 Screw - 25x KHC 1/2 Small Adhesive capsule - 3842874 - Kwik-X(KH-EZ CRC 1/2x6+KHC1/2“ SM) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x KH-EZ CRC 1/2x6 Screw - 25x KHC 1/2 Small Adhesive capsule - 3842883 - Kwik-X(KH-EZCRC3/4x5 1/2+KHC3/4LG) -
